==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1      = Mimicry
|desc_1      = When entering battle, the Tenebrous Mimiflora may take an alternate form that mimics a different enemy. While in this form, the Tenebrous Mimiflora possesses a Void Ward which grants it immunity to DMG until destroyed. Depending on the form it takes, the Void Ward will have a durability of '''40'''/'''70'''/'''105'''. The durability will reduce by '''1''' when hit by an Elemental attack, or '''3''' when hit by a [[Nightsoul]]-aligned attack.<br><br>When durability is depleted, the Tenebrous Mimiflora will return to its true form and become briefly stunned, but will re-transform after some time. However, when generating the Void Ward for the second time, then from the third time onward, its durability will be reduced to '''20'''/'''35'''/'''53''' and '''8'''/'''14'''/'''21''' respectively.<br><br><!--
-->13 variants of the Tenebrous Mimiflora exist:<ul><!--
--><li>'''40''' initial durability:<ul><!--
--><li>[[Tenebrous Mimesis: Koholasaurus]]</li><!--
--><li>[[Tenebrous Mimesis: Tepetlisaurus]]</li><!--

|name_2      = Attrition
|desc_2      = Some of the Mimiflora's attacks inflict stacks of Attrition on hit. The amount of stacks inflicted depends on the attack. For each stack, the affected character will lose [[HP]] equal to '''1% Max HP + 50''' after a short delay.

|name_3      = Abyssal Impalement
|desc_3      = While in its true form, shoots forward a trail of spikes, dealing '''20% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicting '''1''' stack of '''Attrition''' on hit.

|name_4      = Abyssal Spheres
|desc_4      = While in its true form, shoots 3 homing projectiles, each dealing '''20% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicting '''1''' stack of '''Attrition''' on hit.
}}

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial|Tenebrous Mimiflora}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|Abyssal monsters that have descended to this world from the deep, dark depths of a twisted and alien world, they possess a plant-like appearance.<br>It is said that where the corrosive waves of the dark tide lap, such plant-like dark monsters will grow. But they only bear a superficial resemblance to plants, for it is a form they only adopted to get closer to the tree-like world, that they might extract the necessary concepts from it, and analyze and imitate them.<br>Some raving lunatics who have lost their minds say that those things that extend out like leaves are actually the beginnings of gates to other worlds.|[[Archive]]}}

==Trivia==
* Tenebrous Mimifloras may assume a "closed flower" form when inactive, which itself resembles a closed [[Embercore Flower]].
* When attacking, a Tenebrous Mimiflora's plant-like features will sometimes be visible through their disguise.
